about_the_game:
While this game unfolds in the same universe as our previous title "Black Box - The Shining Immortal", new players can still dive straight in without missing a beat.

❤ 【Game Overview】 ❤

This is a thriller and suspense visual novel themed around "mad love."

The protagonist is a member of a special minority group. The game offers a story of his journey as he forges connections with his online friend, and gradually falls in love.

Set against the backdrop of a futuristic sci-fi world, this medium-length game unfolds within a vast world full of intrigue. Beautifully illustrated in pixel art, with a riveting soundtrack that sets the mood. The game's rich dialogue and introspective monologues are presented in a simple and easily understood manner.

❤ 【Characters】 ❤

❤ 【Estimated Playtime】 ❤

The length of gameplay varies based on each player's reading pace, typically ranges from 3 to 5 hours. A game streaming may take about 6 hours.

content_descriptors.notes: The game depicts fictional violence, crime, drug use, torture, murder, sexual incidents and persecutions of minors in a negative and discouraging way. However they are mildly expressed in text or indirect graphics.
